title: Finally, a useful dual-screen laptop
description: Asuss Zenbook Pro Duo 14 is a 14-inch portable laptop with not one, but two high-resolution, high refresh rate touchscreens. At $2,000, that second screen wont be worth everyones money  but it does come in handy. Heres a rundown of my typical day as a dual-screen laptop user.
